details.title: Constant false alarm rate detectors for pareto clutter models

authors.affiliation: Electronic Warfare and Radar Division, Defence Science and Technology Organisation, Australia
authors.name: Graham Victor Weinberg

details.abstract: Pareto distribution has been introduced into the radar community recently as a suitable model for X-band high resolution maritime sea clutter returns. This intensity clutter model is a simple two parameter power law distribution. It is thus important to consider the development of constant false alarm rate detection processes for targets embedded within such clutter. It is shown that a simple functional transform can produce such detection schemes, whose false alarm probability and threshold are related through simple analytical expressions. These relationships are related intrinsically to Gaussian detection counterparts. Three detectors will be introduced and their performance analysed in both homogeneous and heterogeneous clutter environments. The effect of interfering targets in the training cells will also be examined.

ieee.title: Coherent detection with non-stationary high grazing angle X-band sea-clutter
ieee.displayText: Luke Rosenberg, "Coherent detection with non-stationary high grazing angle X-band sea-clutter", European Radar Conference (EuRAD) 2014 11th, pp. 249-252, 2014.

ieee.title: Analysis of CFAR detection with multiple pulses transmission case in Pareto distributed clutter
ieee.displayText: Mohamed Sahed, Amar Mezache, "Analysis of CFAR detection with multiple pulses transmission case in Pareto distributed clutter", Electrical Engineering (ICEE) 2015 4th International Conference on, pp. 1-6, 2015.

ieee.title: Analysis of a dual order statistic constant false alarm rate detector
ieee.displayText: Graham Weinberg, Aris Alexopoulos, "Analysis of a dual order statistic constant false alarm rate detector", Aerospace and Electronic Systems IEEE Transactions on, vol. 52, pp. 2567-2574, 2016, ISSN 0018-9251.

ieee.title: Asymptotic Performance of the Geometric Mean Detector in Pareto Distributed Clutter
ieee.displayText: Graham V. Weinberg, "Asymptotic Performance of the Geometric Mean Detector in Pareto Distributed Clutter", Signal Processing Letters IEEE, vol. 23, pp. 1538-1542, 2016, ISSN 1070-9908.

ieee.title: Dauphin: A new statistical signal processing language
ieee.displayText: Ross Kyprianou, Bill Moran, Peter Schachte, "Dauphin: A new statistical signal processing language", Radar (Radar) 2013 International Conference on, pp. 464-469, 2013.

ieee.title: On the Construction of CFAR Decision Rules via Transformations
ieee.displayText: Graham V. Weinberg, "On the Construction of CFAR Decision Rules via Transformations", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 55, pp. 1140-1146, 2017, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: A machine learning approach to cognitive radar detection
ieee.displayText: Justin Metcalf, Shannon D. Blunt, Braham Himed, "A machine learning approach to cognitive radar detection", Radar Conference (RadarCon) 2015 IEEE, pp. 1405-1411, 2015.

ieee.title: Sea Clutter Mitigation Using Resonance-Based Signal Decomposition
ieee.displayText: Si Tran Nguyen Nguyen, Waddah A. Al-Ashwal, "Sea Clutter Mitigation Using Resonance-Based Signal Decomposition", Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters IEEE, vol. 12, pp. 2257-2261, 2015, ISSN 1545-598X.
